title: Assessing the State of the Union 2022
description: On 14 September 2022 Ursula von der Leyen, President of the European Commission, delivered the State of the Union address before the European Parliament. In this episode of The Sound of Economics Live, Giuseppe Porcaro hosts Maria Demertzis, André Sapir, Jeromin Zettelmeyer and Georg Zachmann to evaluate the State of the Union address, from the support to Ukraine, energy crisis, recovery plans, as well as the EU’s external policies.
itunes:summary: In this episode, we look at the State of the Union address delivered by Ursula von der Leyen, President of the European Commission.
itunes:author: Bruegel
dc:creator: Bruegel
